rules_text:
Choose one or both –
• Return target land card in your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
• Return target creature card in your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: [i]Every year Zeramander razes the same forest, and like clockwork Silfidiae grows it out further.[/i]

“Say what you will about Silfidiae, he knows what he wants and how to get it unlike you.”
— Undue to Osavotus.
